page.title: 04 The Surgery at Highbury
page.content: On Friday 10th May we went to the {Surgery. }We had a look around and we asked a lot of questions.We interviewed the{receptionist.}When we we got there we went in the records room.The receptionist typed my second name on the computer and up came my name and where I live and when I was born and what sex I was. We took a tape recorder with us.We taped the questions that we asked.The receptionist pulled out somebody's record.We had a look in the rest room. Here are some of our questions How many patients are there every day ? Answer: In winter, 60-70 patients; in summer, 40-45 patients. How long has the receptionist worked here? She has worked here for six years. How many men and ladies over 90? There are 3 ladies and 1 man.
